1282300.name: Blood Rage: Digital Edition - Mythical Monsters
1282300.description:
While lesser creatures can only cower, the most monstrous mythical creatures of Midgard seek to find glory by joining you in your final battle before the end of the world.

The Mythical Monsters DLC unlocks two packs of new exclusive beasts to play in single-player mode and online multiplayer:

Original KS Exclusives

  • Fenrir
  • Wolfman
  • Mountain Giant
  • Mystic Troll

Digital KS Exclusives

  • Mountain Giantess
  • Garm
  • Seer Troll
  • Wolfwoman
  • Ymir
  • Hildisvini
  • Nídhöggr

These monsters can dramatically change the course of the game with their special abilities.
Draft them wisely, upgrade your clan and use them on the battlefield at the right turn to gain the upper hand against opposing clans.

To arms, brothers & sisters! Glory only belongs to the fearless.
1282300.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
